description: At the end of this creature's turn, it grants your creatures a {CONDNAME_BUFF_BARRIER} and {CONDNAME_BUFF_SHELL}. At the start of this creature's turn, it shatters your creatures' {CONDNAME_BUFF_BARRIER} buffs, dealing damage to enemies equal to 300% of the {CONDNAME_BUFF_BARRIER}'s absorption.
name: Bouquet
